Body: I bought the HTC One from China. I have rooted it succesfully and removed all bloatwares in chinese language. It has english language but it says "English (China)" How can I install any other english like english(India) or english (UK)The problem is still when someone calls me its shows some chinese charcter . Even in call logs it shows the same.I installed the Morelocale2 but when I change ot to English India. it says NA.But can be done? Please help. I searched on internet too but didnt find any solution for this.
Title: How to change System Language in Android?

history.Text: I bought the HTC One from China. I have rooted it succesfully and removed all bloatwares in chinese language. It has english language but it says "English (China)" How can I install any other english like english(India) or english (UK)The problem is still when someone calls me its shows some chinese charcter . Even in call logs it shows the same.I installed the Morelocale2 but when I change ot to English India. it says NA.But can be done? Please help. I searched on internet too but didnt find any solution for this.
How to change System Language in Android?
